name: versionpill
description: Project management for AI-native development. Manage roadmaps, tasks, releases, and context directly from Claude Code. 65 tools for complete project lifecycle.

commands.name: vp
commands.description: Quick access to Version Pill - manage tasks, releases, and context
commands.prompt: Use the Version Pill MCP to help the user. Available actions: list tasks, create task, start task, complete task, plan releases, get context. Ask what they want to do.

commands.name: vp-sync
commands.description: Sync Version Pill context to/from your repo
commands.prompt:
Help the user sync their Version Pill project with their codebase. Options:
1. sync_to_repo - Push context/tasks/skills to .versionpill/ folder
2. sync_from_repo - Import CLAUDE.md and other docs into Version Pill

Ask which direction they want to sync.

commands.name: vp-release
commands.description: Plan and create releases from completed tasks
commands.prompt: Use Version Pill MCP to plan releases. Call plan_releases to analyze done tasks and suggest releases. If they approve, call plan_releases with createDrafts=true to create draft releases.

skills.name: Project Context
skills.description: Get full project context including tech stack, goals, and current work

setup.instructions: Get your API key at https://versionpill.com → Settings → API Keys
